title: EPA Gridded 2012 Methane Emissions
description: Gridded inventory of U.S. anthropogenic methane emissions that is consistent with the 2016 U.S. EPA Inventory of U.S. Greenhouse Gas Emissions and Sinks estimates for 2012. See https://www.epa.gov/ghgemissions/gridded-2012-methane-emissions for more information.  Note: Only the potion of the gridded inventory that is over California is displayed. Values in Tg/yr.
